item.title: Assassin’s Creed Shadows Switch 2 Release Date Leaks Online
item.content:encoded:
According to a reliable source, Assassin’s Creed Shadows is set to arrive for the Nintendo Switch 2 this year, on December 5, 2025.

Rumours about Assassin’s Creed Shadows coming to Switch 2 have been popping up for a long time now. We first saw a PEGI rating for the Switch 2 port surface online, and then, recently, a listing at a French storefront was revealed with a placeholder image and product description. Now, we have the release date as well for AC Shadows on Switch 2.

Assassin’s Creed Shadows Arrives for Switch 2 This December

A report from Dealabs reveals that, through their investigations, they have confirmed that Assassin’s Creed Shadows will arrive for the Nintendo Switch 2 on December 5, 2025. The game will also receive a physical version, but it will be on a game key card, meaning players will have to download it to their console.

The pre-order date for AC Shadows on Switch 2 hasn’t been confirmed, but according to their data, it should begin by November 7. Lastly, the price for the Switch 2 port has been revealed, and it seems the game can be purchased for around €50, with some retailers offering promotional offers.

For those unaware, Assassin’s Creed Shadows is set in feudal Japan, where players step into the shoes of 2 heroes, Naoe and Yasuke, and experience the story from 2 perspectives. Naoe is a quick-witted shinobi who excels in stealth and shadows. At the same time, Yasuke is a formidable samurai with expertise in strength and steel.

Assassin’s Creed Shadows has also already received its Claws of Awaji DLC, which adds 10 hours of content to the game, along with a new weapon, skills, and abilities. Naoe and Yasuke embark on a new adventure to secure an object for Japan’s future.

In other news, Assassin’s Creed Shadows recently received update 1.1.1, which added a new level, free legacy costumes, and more. What are your thoughts on Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ Switch 2 release date? Let us know through the official Insider Gaming forums discussion.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the Pokémon TCG Pocket’s Year One Anniversary Update. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Pokémon TCG Pocket Year One Anniversary Update Includes Huge Wonder Pick Buff
item.content:encoded:
It’s hard to believe it’s been a year since Pokémon TCG Pocket launched. The mobile-only card-collecting experience has been a great imitation of real-life buying, collecting, and trading, and Pocket is undergoing significant changes as part of its first anniversary.

Pokémon TCG Pocket is a much cheaper alternative to collecting physical Pokémon cards. It has proven to be another money-making phenomenon, with regular updates adding new sets and features. While the community is still divided over Deluxe Pack ex, more updates are being prepared in the background.

Pokémon TCG Pocket Updating Trading & Wonder Picks

Pokémon TCG Pocket’s first anniversary is set to bring three major changes and improvements: A new Share feature, an upgrade to Trading, and improved Wonder Picks.

Firstly, the new Share feature allows you to gift one of your friends a card between one and four-Diamond rarity once a day. A quick one-off gift that should allow you to fill any collection gaps much faster.

The second change is the range of tradeable cards you can choose from. Recent booster packs will now be eligible for trading, and you’re no longer restricted to the old-school rarity limits.

The game will allow you to trade the following rarities:

  • One-Diamond
  • Two-Diamond
  • Three-Diamond
  • Four-Diamond
  • One-Star
  • Two-Star
  • One-Shiny
  • Two-Shiny

Finally, the Wonder Pick mechanic is getting a decent overhaul. The only meaningful change since the game’s launch has been the Sneak Peek bonus that appears every now and again—and it doesn’t even activate that often.

According to the official Pokémon Pocket channel: “Cards from the latest expansion you have not obtained will appear more often,” and “The number of cards you currently own will be displayed on each card in Wonder Pick.”

The anniversary announcement doesn’t say when any of these features are dropping. We’ll have to wait and see on this.

It’s clear the team is listening to the fanbase. Do you think these changes address key areas of the game? Is there anything else that needs to be tweaked or added? Let us know through the Insider Gaming Forum.

For more on Pocket, check out reports that Pokémon TCG Pocket is set to debut Mega Evolutions later this year.

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.

item.title: Anime Eternal Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Anime Eternal is a classic anime-themed incremental simulator where you must build a team of Stars to defeat powerful NPCs. Typically, you’ll need to grind for hours to unlock new world maps. However, by redeeming the active October 2025 Anime Eternal codes, your fighters can start clearing enemies in the blink of an eye and access the latest maps in Roblox.

These codes grant a variety of rewards, including Avatar Souls, Keys, Potions, and Macarons. Level up your avatars using Avatar Souls, earn bonus Coins and XP with Potions, and use Credits to access exclusive store items for free through the Roblox codes listed below. 

Active Anime Eternal Codes 

Inactive Anime Eternal Codes 

  • MoreFeaturesOnSundayUpdate17
  • 490KFav
  • 495KFav
  • Update16P2Fix2
  • WhyNotGiveSundayCodeUp17
  • 445KFav
  • 54kPlayers
  • FunnyGreenPlanetShutdown2
  • NoWayWeCanHit70K?
  • 51kPlayers
  • Update14P3
  • Update14P2
  • 37KPlayersOn
  • Update7Part2
  • 40KLikes
  • Update3
  • 2KPlayers
  • 50KVISITS
  • Update17KPlayers
  • 25KLIKES
  • Update5Part1
  • 80KLIKES
  • 14KPlayers

How To Redeem Anime Eternal Codes

Activating the Anime Eternal codes is child’s play; all you have to do is follow these simple steps: 

  1. Launch Anime Eternal and spawn on the map. 
  2. Select the ‘Shop’ icon.
  3. Scroll down to the end to find the code box. 
  4. Enter the active code in the ‘Enter code…’ text box. 
  5. Click the ‘Redeem!’ button to claim free rewards. 

More About Anime Eternal  

The following Keys can be obtained by redeeming the current active Anime Eternal codes: 

  • Restaurant Key
  • Ghoul Key
  • Progression Key 
  • Chainsaw Key
  • Progression Key 2 
  • Cursed Key
  • Sin Key 
  • Green Planet Key
  • Mundo Key
  • Key of Suffering
  • Hollow Key
  • Storm Dragon Key 

Macarons are potion-like variants that offer small buffs for a short duration. Eight types of Macarons can be claimed from the codes, and they are: 

  • Energy Macaron
  • Coin Macaron
  • Damage Macaron
  • Luck Macaron
  • EXP Macaron
  • Star Macaron
  • Soul Macaron
  • Drop Macaron 

The Dragon Race Tokens are used for Dragon Race rolls. Here are all the Dragon Races with their roll chance percentage:

  • Human – 40.55%
  • Android – 33%
  • Namekian – 19.9%
  • Frost Demon – 5%
  • Majin – 1%
  • Half-Saiyan – 0.5%
  • Saiyan – 0.05%

Where To Find New Anime Eternal Codes

Similar to most Roblox experiences with promo codes, you must join Anime Eternal’s official Discord channel to find new codes. Certain codes are also posted on the platform’s homepage. Another option is to keep track of our active codes list, as they will be updated once the latest codes debut.  

Are you a big anime games fan in Roblox? Then be sure to check out our Insider Gaming forum, where you can start up some new discussions.

While you’re getting involved in Roblox, check out our code guides for other games, such as Basketball Zero, Anime Last Stand, and Weak Legacy 2.

item.title: Demonfall Codes (October 2025)
item.content:encoded:
A popular way to get better items and abilities in Demonfall quickly is to make use of the many October 2025 Demonfall codes. This makes Demonfall codes extremely popular among newer players of the game, as it allows them to bridge the gap between themselves and the competition fairly fast. 

Are you a fan of the popular anime series Demon Slayer? If yes, we suggest that you take a couple of minutes to check out this riveting Roblox game—Demonfall. Inspired almost entirely by Demon Slayer, Demonfall drops players into the role of a demon hunter, responsible for fighting against various characters in the game. This then helps players progress through the game’s story, while also helping improve their own abilities—and you can progress faster with Demonfall monthly codes and rewards.

Active Demonfall Codes

  • WeAreSoBACK! – Free Rewards (New)

Expired Demonfall Codes 

  • !BUGFIX
  • !MAINTENANCE
  • !code resetpoints
  • !update30
  • !code 150KLIKES
  • !code wipepotion
  • !code TWITTER1
  • !code 100KLIKES

How To Redeem Demonfall Codes

Redeeming Demonfall codes is a straightforward process and doesn’t require any specific criteria to be met before the code redemption feature gets unlocked. It’s as simple as navigating through the menus and finding the codes section. For players who may be unfamiliar with the Roblox ecosystem, here’s a simple step-by-step guide to redeeming Demonfall codes:

  1. Launch Roblox and open up Demonfall
  2. Click on the Tab button to open up the menu
  3. Click on the Cog (Settings) button
  4. Input one of the active codes given above into the text box
  5. Hit the ‘Enter’ key to receive your rewards

How To Get More Demonfall Codes

Although there is currently only one working code in the game, players are urged to wait patiently, as new Demonfall codes are surely on the horizon. Considering the popularity that Demonfall has gained since its release, the developers are almost certainly working on new content for the game, and new content updates usually mean new codes.

Although there’s no set timeline for code drops, they usually come out along with updates, so players would be smart to keep their eyes peeled. While tracking the game’s socials and official Discord server for new codes is an option, a simpler and more hassle-free way to stay ahead of the curve would be to simply bookmark this page. We update this article as soon as any new codes drop, so checking in every now and then would be the best course of action.

Be sure to check out our Insider Gaming forum, where you can start up some new discussions about the best anime games in Roblox.

If you’re a fan of anime games in Roblox, then you can also check out our code guides for Steal an Anime, Weak Legacy 2, and Type Soul
